titleStmt.title: The true state & condition of the seven foot-companies in the city of London-Derry, under the command of the severall captains following viz Robert Thornton, Simon Pitt, Henry Fynch, Henry Osborn, John Kilner, Robert Lawson, & William Patsall, (who now commandeth that company which was raised by Hewet Finch, deceased, and for some time commanded by Captain Henry Vaughan) is as followith, viz.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
